text: Responsible for handling large cash amounts on a daily basis for many different types of unique customer transactions† Customer Service Representatives deal with clients from all walks of life and must maintain an empathetic and friendly attitude through every interaction.† Operational multitasking expertise is a must, as every daily task must be performed according to rigid guidelines developed in the best interest of both the client as well as all Financial Center Associates.† While operational excellence is a must, Client Service Representatives are also  responsible for providing information to clients about new products and services that may increase the quality and convenience of the clients' financial life. Each Customer Service Representative is responsible for meeting or exceeding a minimum client referral rate through warm transfers of clients to Relationship Bankers and Relationship Managers.
